title: When you Support but ADC gets all the credit

replies.body: Not in bronze and silver division. Bloody troll supports steal your kills and then apologize.....
Keeps ADC alive by healing and also stunning the enemy. ADC Vayne gets Quadra, accidentally steal Penta, oops. Get flamed hard. -_-

lol carry just wanted that penta on record  :D a good support is just as you have done but unlucky you got last hit but still good work get the adc fed and win win supports role :D
{{champion:201}}
